name: Aliens Ate My Internet
description:
Made for Opera GX Game Jam

https://gamejolt.com/games/AAMI/637937

All around earth UFOs have been landing and feasting on everyone's internet. It's time to try and get back online by taking the fight to the aliens who have devoured your internet.

Destroy the aliens to pick up the pieces they ate and repair your internet. Simultaneously these pieces you pick up allow you to get more powerful. As you level up you will get to choose upgrades to install that will provide you with various benefits.

· Delve into the endless depths of your browser to defeat the aliens.

· Take on the aliens with various weapon, ammo, and health pickups / upgrades.

· Take turns with a friend to see who can get the highest score or try out local COOP!

· Every experience is different, with randomly generated levels!

HOW TO PLAY

P1 · WASD to move / navigate menu

· Left mouse button to shoot / "N" for COOP

· Right mouse button / "M" for COOP to throw your weapon / pick up weapons

· Escape to return to the main menu / exit

· Enter to pause / select / return to previous menu

P2 · Arrow keys to move / navigate menu

· Numpad "0" to shoot

· Numpad "." to throw your weapon / pick up weapons

· Escape to return to the main menu / exit

· Enter to pause / select / return to previous menu

This was my entry for the Opera GX Game Jam. Any feedback is really appreciated, hopefully you have fun playing Aliens Ate My Internet! Enjoy!
